document_data.mainbody:
Gen Soleilon, who was also called the Radiant King, was the first King of the Soleilon Dynasty who ruled the city-state of Westgate.
Gen was a powerful paladin of Lathander, the Morninglord. He claimed the throne after killing King Orlak, the Night King, ending his long-standing reign of terror over the city. Gen reigned from  until . 
Gens son and heir was Lemere I.
